Name: Cold Steel Knife
Description: Cold Steel Knife General Category Knives Tech Tier Tier 3 Description A sturdy Knife crafted using Cold Steel, unique to Icarus. Meat harvested with this knife will take more time to spoil. Flavor Text One of the few tools that are only available on Icarus, due to the nature of the materials required. Statistics Attributes +15% chance to cause Freeze on Hit with Attacks +30% Chance to apply the Chilled Modifier Melee Damage 33 - 35 Melee Damage Element Damage 35 - 35 Frost Damage Skinning 200% Yield from Skinning Weight 0.5 Kg Durability 150,000 Misc Crafted At Forge Foundry Repaired with 1 Cold Steel Ingot
